docs.snippet: Prominent pro-Brexit campaigner Michael Gove has been sacked from his cabinet post of justice secretary by Britain's new Prime Minister Theresa May, Sky News reported on Thursday citing sources....
docs.lead_paragraph: Prominent pro-Brexit campaigner Michael Gove has been sacked from his cabinet post of justice secretary by Britain's new Prime Minister Theresa May, Sky News reported on Thursday citing sources.

headline.main: Pro-Brexit Gove Sacked From the British Government: Sky News

docs.snippet: Interdealer broker ICAP reported a 15 percent slump in  first-quarter average daily volume on its foreign exchange trading platform EBS, despite a trading surge after Britain's vote to leave the European Union sent sterling plunging....
docs.lead_paragraph: Interdealer broker ICAP reported a 15 percent slump in  first-quarter average daily volume on its foreign exchange trading platform EBS, despite a trading surge after Britain's vote to leave the European Union sent sterling plunging.

headline.main: ICAP's Currency Trading Volumes Fall Despite Brexit Surge
headline.print_headline: ICAP's Currency Trading Volumes Fall Despite Brexit Surge

docs.snippet: Britain's vote in a referendum to leave the European Union has caused uncertainty and increased risks to the U.S. economy but thus far it looks likely to have a pretty "negligible" impact on U.S. growth, the International Monetary Fund said on Tue...
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's vote in a referendum to leave the European Union has caused uncertainty and increased risks to the U.S. economy but thus far it looks likely to have a pretty "negligible" impact on U.S. growth, the International Monetary Fund said on Tuesday.

headline.main: IMF Sees 'Negligible' Brexit Impact on U.S. Growth
headline.print_headline: IMF Sees 'Negligible' Brexit Impact on U.S. Growth

docs.snippet: A week-long convulsion in U.S. stocks induced by Britain's vote to leave the European Union has left some on Wall Street feeling a little bit better thanks to stronger expectations of prolonged low interest rates....
